upright.message: A step into the unknown is blessed.

reversed.message: The path is fogged with uncertainty.

upright.message: What is focused becomes real.

reversed.message: The mirror reflects something unclear.

upright.message: The silence knows the answer.

reversed.message: Hidden truths lie beneath the surface.

upright.message: What is sown begins to bloom.

reversed.message: Growth requires deeper roots.

upright.message: Order stands strong against the winds.

reversed.message: Too much control bends the frame.

upright.message: The old ways light the path forward.

reversed.message: Break the rules, or they will break you.

upright.message: Two forces move in harmony.

reversed.message: Disconnection shadows the bond.

upright.message: Momentum carries you forward.

reversed.message: Wheels spin without direction.

upright.message: Soft power bends the iron.

reversed.message: The lion stirs within unrested.

upright.message: In stillness, the answer glows.

reversed.message: Isolation clouds the lantern’s light.

upright.message: The cycle turns in your favor.

reversed.message: The spin slows; fate waits.

upright.message: What is fair shall come to pass.

reversed.message: Balance falters in the shadows.

upright.message: Stillness reveals a deeper view.

reversed.message: Release what you grip too tightly.

upright.message: An end clears the way for rebirth.

reversed.message: Clinging prevents the transformation.

upright.message: Waters blend in quiet harmony.

reversed.message: The vessel spills—find your center.

upright.message: Chains shimmer, though they bind.

reversed.message: The lock weakens—the door cracks open.

upright.message: Foundations tremble before the storm.

reversed.message: The fall can still be softened, but not avoided.

upright.message: A distant light guides your way.

reversed.message: The stars dim; hope flickers faintly.

upright.message: All is not as it seems.

reversed.message: Mist lifts; the path reveals itself.

upright.message: Radiance clears the shadows.

reversed.message: Even behind clouds, the sun remains.

upright.message: A call is heard and answered.

reversed.message: Echoes linger, unheard and unresolved.

upright.message: The circle completes in perfect form.

reversed.message: The last step waits to be taken.
